room_title: Escape room "Blitzkrieg" by Labyrinth Escape Games in Portland
review: Finished chapter 1, and will definitely be going back!!! Lots of fun, even the kids had a great time searching and solving!

room_title: Escape room "Blitzkrieg" by Labyrinth Escape Games in Portland
review: Fantastic puzzles, friendly staff, interesting concept and storyline. Definitely worth every penny!

room_title: Escape room "Blitzkrieg" by Labyrinth Escape Games in Portland
review: Much better than expected! This was a great experience and enjoyable evening activity. Definitely looking at coming back for the other chapters.

room_title: Escape room "Blitzkrieg" by Labyrinth Escape Games in Portland
review: Awesome !!!! True fun .....the folks down at labyrinth "escape games " put a lot of hard work immersing you into a set time period !!! Filled with challenging puzzles that fill you with the energy of Indiana Jones and Sherlock Holmes!!! Great job guys I will be back for more . That's for sure!!!!!

room_title: Escape room "Blitzkrieg" by Labyrinth Escape Games in Portland
review: My family and I just finished one of the puzzle rooms and we all had a blast! Definitely coming back. Our room was the archeological room. Great puzzles and a great way to bring family together!

room_title: Escape room "Blitzkrieg" by Labyrinth Escape Games in Portland
review: Super fun! This was our first escape room experience so we weren't exactly sure what to expect, but it was even better than we imagined! Tricky puzzles, but not impossible. Highly recommended, a fun activity to do with friends! Extremely friendly and helpful staff as well! We already can't wait to do the second room! Thanks guys!!

room_title: Escape room "Blitzkrieg" by Labyrinth Escape Games in Portland
review: Great for team building, did this with 8 people, half from work and half friends. Would definitely recommend this place! The level of detail is amazing and real tailors the experience to the players. Anyone who enjoys puzzle and board games should definitely give this a shot. I would recommend not maxing out the room size as it can be confusing with a large number of people, and communicate, communicate, communicate!We will ALL be coming back soon for sure!Very friendly staff, great ideas, completely worth it!
